p: Due to the previous experience in facing the SARS pandemic, the Chinese government did a great job by meeting the international standards in terms of the isolation of suspected cases, diagnosis and treatment and educational campaigns. But despite this fact, the virus continued to spread due to the mobility of infected cases, and Lancet explained that there were concerns due to the daily increase in the number of cases and the many gaps faced as a result of the incomplete and rapidly changing epidemic [ 17].
